alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Miami (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 8:40PM EDT until June 15 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Champaign County in west central Ohio... Northwestern Clark County in west central Ohio... Northeastern Miami County in west central Ohio... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 840 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Piqua, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Springfield, Troy, Piqua, Urbana, St. Paris, Christiansburg, North Hampton, Fletcher, Tremont City, Casstown, Thackery, Westville, Millerstown, Farrington, Terre Haute, Lawrenceville, Dialton and State Route 41 at State Route 235. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 76 and 85. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
